channel.title: API Adventures
channel.description: People, Places, Things and the Web

item.title: Im Hiring
item.description:
Calling all enginers

I'm currently looking for mobile engineers (iOS and Android), web developers and chapter leads to join the team.

You'll join a strong team of designers and engineers who have the bold mission of Scaling Spotify’s Design Language here at Spotify HQ in Stockholm. Working at Spotify provides you with countless opportunities for personal growth and development as well as all the usual benefits of working in a large global tech company.

item.title: “Women in Technology”
item.description:
Today I was in New Broadcasting House (NBH) along with colleagues across Digital & Engineering for the BBC Women in Tech Event.

item.title: “Clean My Horse Rug Launches”
item.description:
Rug cleaning service launches

Clean My Horse Rug has now launched and is ready to receive orders. For comments and enquiries visit our Facebook page. If you are ready to place and order, go right ahead, what are you waiting for ?
